entries.title: Unlock your trapped data: Driving insights from edge-to-cloud
entries.description: Explore how hybrid cloud and edge computing technologies often create data silos, and how systems like HPE's GreenLake can transform those silos into resources and actionable insights.

entries.title: Amazon Fire TV Omni Series QLED review
entries.description: The Amazon Fire TV Omni Series QLED is a surprisingly robust model with great picture and sound. But it should be a TV first and an Amazon device a distant second.

entries.title: Singapore can now order social media sites to block access, as 'online safety' law kicks in
entries.description: Effective from February 1, Singapore's Online Safety Act comprises a new section that regulates online communication services--specifically, social media platforms--that must comply with directives to block local access to "egregious" content or face potential fines.

entries.title: Emporia Energy smart EV charger review: More power telemetry for a lower price
entries.description: If you're in the market for a smart EV charger with broad integration and detailed energy monitoring, look no further than the Emporia EV Charger.

entries.title: Samsung Galaxy S23, new Galaxy Books are coming tomorrow: Everything we know so far
entries.description: Ahead of Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2023, there's already a promotion to get you up to $100 in credits toward a new Galaxy phone. But you'll have to act fast -- it runs through Feb. 1.

entries.title: The Garmin Instinct Solar is now just $230 on Amazon
entries.description: At $230, the Garmin Instinct Solar Smartwatch is at the lowest price this product has seen. That means this 34% off discount may not last too long.

entries.title: Microsoft brings a new look to Teams Rooms on Windows
entries.description: Microsoft gives Teams Rooms on Windows a visual refresh to align it better with Teams on Android.

entries.title: Schlage adds new Lever smart lock to Encode lineup
entries.description: Can't find a Schlage Encode Plus anywhere? Well, you'll soon be able to get your hands on a new member of the Encode family but no, this one is not HomeKit-compatible.

entries.title: This has replaced my multitool for a fraction of the cost
entries.description: I've decided that multitools are too flashy, too expensive, and not really that good.

entries.title: Is this $69 USB-C docking station the ultimate mobile accessory?
entries.description: The Plugable USB-C Stand Dock can extend the contents of your phone or tablet's display onto a monitor with all the ports and charging power needed, while keeping your device perfectly viewable.

entries.title: Phishing attacks are getting scarily sophisticated. Here's what to watch out for
entries.description: Phishing campaigns use fake social media profiles, in-depth research, and more to trick unsuspecting victims into clicking malicious links.

entries.title: Remote work means less commuting, but more time working
entries.description: Workers have more time, thanks to less travelling to work - but how that time is spent is a big question.

entries.title: A 'more premium' Nothing Phone (2) is coming this year. Here's what we know so far
entries.description: Nothing's Phone (2) will launch in the US later this year.

entries.title: Save $90 when you pick up Jabra's Elite 85t wireless ANC earbuds at Best Buy
entries.description: The current sale has knocked down the price of these high-end wireless earbuds to just under $140.

entries.title: Samsung's fourth quarter profit dips from poor chip and smartphone sales
entries.description: Samsung warmed that macroeconomic uncertainties are expected to continue up to the first half of 2023.
